overview_of_class: Clinical Assisting in Speech Language Pathology provides an introduction to clinical practice. The course consists of two class sessions per week, plus a "lab." The lab is an individual assignment of each student to a lead clinician and client in the Northwestern University Speech, Language, and Learning Clinic.
name: Clinical Assisting in Speech and Language Pathology
class_attributes:
Prerequisites apply, see description

Jrs, Srs, Grad Students Only
subject: CSD
